BaseLogger - Class in GUI
BaseLogger is a class for logging application info and error messages into respective text files.

Blurring - Class in filters
This class contains method to blur an image.
Blurring() - Constructor for class filters.Blurring
 
blurringFilter(ImageMatrix, int) - Static method in class filters.Blurring
This static method applies a blurring filter to an image, using a convolution operation.
Brightness - Class in filters
The Brightness class applies a brightness filter to an ImageMatrix.
Brightness() - Constructor for class filters.Brightness
 
BrightnessFilter(ImageMatrix, int) - Static method in class filters.Brightness
Adjusts the brightness of the given ImageMatrix based on the provided percentage.
